title: Pixel XL sudden unsolvable low volume issues
content:
Still have an original Pixel XL, all up to date and in good condition. Sometime in the last month, my media volume randomly cuts down to what sounds like 30% of max volume even though all sliders are maxed. 

It happens using Spotify, watching YouTube or Facebook videos, pretty much any media volume. 

The closest comparison I can think of is imagine you're mid video on YouTube and receive a notification, you hear the tone while the background audio from YouTube still plays at probably 1/3 normal volume. 

Anytime I start to watch a video, or play music, I hear the full volume for a moment or two before it just cuts down to what sounds like less than 30%.

Any help is appreciated. I've tried to disable absolute volume with no success. Makes no difference in behavior.
